titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Minnie Lee Ryan Collection, 1922
titlestmt.subtitle: Ryan, Minnie Lee, Collection Ms2019-021

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2019-05-30 15:37:12-0400

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2019-021

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Minnie Lee Ryan Collection contains a May 28, 1922, letter from "Jack" to Ryan about their relationship as well as a 1922 newspaper clipping entitled Blacksburg High School Graduates listing Ryan, amongst others.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Minnie Lee Ryan Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Minnie Lee Ryan Collection, Ms2019-021, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg,

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to Special Collections in May 2019.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the collection was completed in May 2019.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Minnie Lee Ryan was born August 14, 1904, in Albemarle County, Virginia, to William Lee and Josephine Adelaide (Cox) Ryan. Minnie graduated from Blacksburg High School in 1922, and she later married Glenn Wilburn Harkins. She died on August 26, 1990, in Staunton, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Minnie Lee Ryan Collection contains a scrapbook page with a newspaper clipping and a letter and envelope for Minnie Lee Ryan. On Virginia Polytechnic Insitute letterhead, the May 28, 1922, letter is from "Jack" to Minnie Lee Ryan about their relationship. The newspaper clipping entitled Blacksburg High School Graduates lists Minnie Ryan, amongst others, and is dated 1922.

did.unittitle: Letter from Jack to Minnie Lee Ryan and transcription, 1922-05-28
Scrapbook page with envelope and newspaper clipping, 1922
